FuncDef:
The priority-mode command sets the scheduling mode of priority-mode flow queues to PQ or WFQ.
The undo priority-mode command restores the default settings.
By default, the scheduling mode of priority-mode flow queues is WFQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the priority value of a scheduler.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 3.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To set the scheduling mode of priority-mode flow queues to PQ or WFQ, run the priority command.
